name: squarespace-webpack-boilerplate
description: A webpack boilerplate for building Squarespace templates

scripts.build: npm run clean:live && npm run build:prod && cp -av ./src/template/* ./dist/live/template/ && (cd ./dist/live/template && find . -name '.gitkeep' -type f -ls -delete)
scripts.build:css: npm run build:css-main && npm run build:css-crit
scripts.build:css-crit: lessc $npm_package_config_less_crit_file $npm_package_config_css_crit_file --autoprefix='last 2 versions' --clean-css && gulp critical-block && npm run clean:crit
scripts.build:dev: npm run build:js && npm run build:css
scripts.build:prod: npm run build:js-prod && npm run build:css
scripts.build:staging: npm run clean:staging && npm run build:prod && cp -av ./src/template/* ./dist/staging/template/ && (cd ./dist/staging/template && find . -name '.gitkeep' -type f -ls -delete
scripts.watch: npm run build:dev && parallelshell 'npm run watch:js' 'npm run watch:styles' 'npm run watch:sync'

author: mario.perez415@gmail.com
